attributes.action: Increase the number of work experience placements for young people aged 15-19 in London.
attributes.additional_details: We are a group of young people campaigning to increase the number of work experience placements for young people in London especially for those in the boroughs of Lambeth and Southwark. We are have pledges from businesses that tell us they support us. We also propose, is possible, that some sort of incentive be introduced for businesses if they take on more young people for work experience.
